summary: Karan, a disavowed Indian commando, helps protect a woman from a local thug who is hellbent on forcing her to marry him.
cast: Vidyut Jammwal|Hsieh Chang Hai|Nelson Liao Sheng Hua|Ishita Vyas|Sukhwinder Chahal|Sunil Uppal|Chand Kishore|Grant Powell|Jaideep Ahlawat|Darshan Jariwala|Jagat Rawat|Ravi Singh|Jarnail Singh|Bhagwan Tiwari|Sohrab Handa|Dimple Bagroy|Karandeep Singh|Vikramjeet|Pooja Chopra|Jigar Gill|Baljinder Kaur|Paramveer Singh|Manpreet Singh|Brijesh|Gorkhi|Ramji Bali|Rahul|Bhanu|Om Prakash|Ashwani Nahar|Joginder Singh|Nirmal|Nathan Barris|Isher Singh|Satwant Bal|Nathalia Kaur|Anoop Kamal Singh|Arti Rautela|Nishi Singh|Jassi|Aashin A. title: Commando
